item.title: Compact Client Side Filtering: Neutrino
item.description: Introduction Aaron van Wirdum: 00:01:34 Live from Utrecht, this is The Van Wirdum Sjorsnado. Sjors Provoost: 00:01:37 Hello. Aaron van Wirdum: 00:01:38 Van Wirdum Sjorsnado. Did I say it right this time? Sjors Provoost: 00:01:42 I don’t know. We’re not going to check again. This is take number three. Now you’re going to ask me whether I rioted and I’m gonna say no. Aaron van Wirdum: 00:01:51 You’re like psychic.
